data.name: Bird run adventure for Run, chicken, run!
data.detailed_description:
Bird run adventure for Run, chicken, run! - this is an additional content, with the new design for the endless game for the whole family. If you are bored with the chicken run, you can run as a bird!

Imagine that forest was captured by otherworldly forces, many animals are caught and placed in cages. They are feeling lonely, scared and very sad. But a brave funny yellow bird has decided to make everything possible save his friends.

Help him in his quest to rescue all the animals in the forest. Run away from the pursuer as fast as you can, break the cages, free animals and collect stars. But you must be very careful, beware of stones and rockets, jump over the water, if you will fall in the water you will die. Yes, this is a forest and there are a lot of different dangerous obstacles, but don't forget that yellow bird live here for a lot of time and forest is his home.

Bird run adventure will not let you be bored. Yellow bird can run, accelerate and fly with parachute, if this is necessary, but he is just a small bird and sometimes he becomes tired. If he will get tired he may ask his friends: bull and gorilla, to give him a ride. All animals love yellow bird and are always ready to help. Run forward, collect stars and change them to another main heroes or to rockets, new rides on bull or gorilla, to the acceleration and many other cool features. You can dress your yellow bird to give him a special style. Download this DLC and find out what else it can offer you. I am sure you will not regret.

Features:
Nice colorful design
Funny personages and music
Easy control
Multi language support
Universal adventure for all ages

Bird run adventure is a fun adventure that the whole family will enjoy!

The content of this DLC will be available from the game main menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Bird run adventure for Run, chicken, run!

subs.option_text: Bird run adventure for Run, chicken, run! - $1.99
